channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My life partner is 18 years my senior. He wants to leave his $4.5 million fortune to me — not his two kids. Do we tell them?
item.description: “No doubt they would feel the arrangement is unfair, and that would potentially end our relationship.”

item.title: Government spending and capital expenditure ‘supercycle’ drive latest S&P 500 target boost
item.description: BNP’s strategy note “Running It Hot” predicts the S&P 500 at 6,700 12 months out, with Eurostoxx 600 rising to 590.

item.title: More older adults are dying from falls. Here’s how to reduce the risk.
item.description: Death rates from falls jumped more than 70% for older adults in the last 20 years.

item.title: Here are three big things the market is getting wrong about U.S. stocks, says this bank
item.description: The market is underestimating U.S. growth and is too pessimistic about earnings, says HSBC.

item.title: Bitcoin’s ascent reaches a new record as shorts fold and inflows mount
item.description: Bitcoin hit a fresh high above $118,000 on Friday a day after the second-highest daily inflows on record to bitcoin ETFs.

item.title: Tom Lee's Granny Shots ETF is crushing the market and raking in cash
item.description: The Fundstrat Granny Shots US Large Cap ETF (GRNY) hit $1.5 billion in assets under management just eight months after launch.
